data.name: About_WindowsStoreDesktop
data.value: Check out the Windows version for desktop and tablet!

data.name: About_WindowsStorePhone
data.value: Check out the Windows Phone version!

data.name: Analytics_DisableQuestion
data.value: Do not show questions about your usage of 2Day

data.name: Analytics_DoNoShowAgain
data.value: Do not show this kind of message in the future :-(

data.name: Analytics_NotificationTest
data.value: Please take 30s to answer a quick question

data.name: Analytics_Title
data.value: Quick question question to help improve 2Day!

data.name: BootstrapDragTaskNote
data.value: Move this task on the left menu or on another group

data.name: BootstrapSlideTaskTitle
data.value: Slide right to complete a task

data.name: BootstrapVoiceCommandTaskNote
data.value: Did you know you can add tasks and reminders using your voice ? On your Windows Phone home screen, hold the Windows button and say for example: "2Day, add a task for tomorrow". If you tap the “?” button during voice recognition, you will be able to see all the commands supported by 2Day.

data.name: Context_EmptyHint
data.value: Set a task to this context to get started

data.name: Crash_MessageContent
data.value: We are sorry because 2Day had an error. Do you want to send the details to the development team ?

data.name: CreateEditTaskPage_NotifyWithDueDateFormat
data.value: Task '{0}' added in folder {1} due on {2}

data.name: Dialog_DeleteContextText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this context ? Any task with this context will lose its context.

data.name: Dialog_DeleteFolderText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this folder ? All associated tasks will be lost and you cannot undo this operation.

data.name: Dialog_DeleteSmartViewText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this smart view ?

data.name: Dialog_DeleteTagText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?

data.name: Dialog_DeleteTask
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

data.name: Dialog_RestartToApply
data.value: 2Day must restart to apply this change. Exit 2Day now ?

data.name: Dialog_SyncContextsNotSupported
data.value: You are using a synchronization mode that does not support contexts. Contexts will not be synced accross your device. Do you want to learn more ?

data.name: EditFolderPage_ColorUsageCount
data.value: Number of time this color is used

data.name: Folder_EmptyHint
data.value: Add a task to get started

data.name: MessageReview_Body
data.value: It looks like you're enjoying 2Day, would you like to help us by reviewing our application?

data.name: Message_CannotCreateTaskNoFolderMessage
data.value: You must have at least one folder to create a task. Do you want to create a folder now ?

data.name: Message_DeleteAllMessage
data.value: Do you want to clear all tasks, folders and contexts (no undo possible) ?

data.name: Message_SpeechExceptionFormat
data.value: There was an error while using speech recognition ({0})

data.name: MiscDeleteAll
data.value: Delete all tasks, folders and contexts

data.name: Notification_DueCannotBeNull
data.value: Due date or start date must be defined for recurring tasks

data.name: Notification_FolderUnpinnedFormat
data.value: The folder {0} has been unpinned from start menu.

data.name: Notification_TaskUnpinnedFormat
data.value: The task '{0}' has been unpinned from start menu.

data.name: OptionSettingsPage_DescriptionTasksFormat
data.value: auto delete after {0} day(s), completed tasks {1}

data.name: OptionSettingsPage_SectionOrderingFormat
data.value: ordering by {0} then by {1} and by {2}

data.name: SmartView_EmptyHeader
data.value: Smart view does not match any task

data.name: SmartView_EmptyHint
data.value: Adjust smart view option or add a task that match smart view rules

data.name: SmartView_IntroDescription
data.value: Smart view helps focusing on the task that matters. Setup rules to configure how tasks are filtered and focus on what matters the most.

data.name: SmartView_MessageCannotLoadFormat
data.value: There was an error while loading this smart view ({0})

data.name: SmartView_MessageCannotSave
data.value: The smart view contains invalid rules

data.name: SmartView_Warning_OneBlockMin
data.value: Smart view must have at least 1 block of rules

data.name: SmartView_Warning_OneRuleMin
data.value: Smart view must have at least 1 rule

data.name: Speech_ErrorDuringRecognitionFormat
data.value: There was an error during speech recognition ({0})

data.name: Speech_ReviewPermission
data.value: Permission to access microphone is disabled, please update Windows settings

data.name: StartDate_FirstTimeMessage
data.value: You can change how tasks with a start date are displayed in the general settings.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_CollectLogFirst
data.value: Please enable log first and try to use sync to collect diagnostic content.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_DeleteAccountDescription
data.value: Delete the account in the sync service and remove sync settings.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_DiagnosticsDescription
data.value: Check sync status and prepare an email to send to the support team.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_EmailDetail
data.value: Please give the maximum amount of details about the sync problem in the email.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_MergeDescription
data.value: Get all remote content from a full sync. Then perform a merge between local and remote content. Use modification dates to find out what version use.

data.name: SyncAdvanced_ReplaceDescription
data.value: Remove all content from 2Day (folders, contexts, tasks) in this app. Then perform a full synchronization from your service to 2Day.

data.name: SyncSettingsPage_ConfirmDeleteMessage
data.value: Do you want to delete your sync settings ?

data.name: Sync_DeleteAccount_ErrorFormat
data.value: There was an error while deleting your account ({0})

data.name: Sync_DeleteAccount_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?

data.value: Add a task in a folder to get started

data.value: Get back to work and finish some tasks :-)

data.value: All your tasks are under control :-)

data.value: No task for the coming week

data.value: Time to go off for vacation ?

data.name: WelcomePage_ValueProposition1
data.value: Your brain is made to get ideas, not store them

data.name: WelcomePage_ValueProposition2
data.value: Develop and fine-tune your perfect task management system in the most advanced todo-list for Windows

data.name: Dialog_RestartInfo
data.value: 2Day must restart to apply this change.

data.name: Exchange_InvalidSyncKeyWorkaround
data.value: Invalid synchronization key. Recommended workaround is to perform a 'replace' sync.

data.name: Message_DeleteNoSyncIdFormat
data.value: There are {0} task(s) that seems to be only in 2Day and not synced. They might be lost if they were not synced properly. Continue ?

data.value: Number of tasks that match the smartview:
